GalleryContent.Body: You can now apply colors into the geometry that you create. Visualise all your analysis data using color coded elements within Dynamo. Look out for Core > Display. Canvas also comes with better grid and the ability to visualise vectors.
You can select multiple nodes and group them together to add note related to that group. Shortcut is Ctrl + G for grouping. For switching between background preview and node view, use Ctrl + B
All your working files are always safe, even when Dynamo crashes. Look out for the recovered files in the start page when you restart Dynamo after crash.
You can select multiple nodes at one to toggle on / off the geometry preview.
You can now drag items from library. It helps you place your nodes precisely in the first try.
